title.narrative: Mother and Child Health Services Strengthening Project

description.narrative: The objective of the Project is to increase the utilization and improve the quality of maternal and child health services in targeted areas

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Accounting software purchase, installation and maintenance | Description :The Recipient shall, not later thantwo (2) months after the Effective Date, acquire, install and thereafter maintain an accountingsoftware acceptable to theAssociation, for the Project. | Due Date :28-Nov-2014

Finance Agreement :Financial statements audited | Description :The Recipient shall have its Financial Statements audited inaccordance with the provisions of Section 4.09 (b) of the General Conditions. Each audit of the Financial Statements shall coverthe period of one fiscal year of the Recipient. The audited Financial Statements for each such period shall be furnished to theAssociation not later than [six months] after the end of such period. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Interim unaudited financial reports | Description : The Recipient shall prepare and furnish to the Associationno later than forty-five (45) days after the end of each calendar quarter, interim unaudited financial reports for the Projectcovering the quarter, in form and substance satisfactor to the Association | Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Recruitment of a Project Coordinator, PBF Expert, Financial Mgt & Proc. Spec M/E | Description :The recipienthas recruited a Project Coordinator /PBF expert, a Financial Management Specialist, a Procurement Specialist and Monitoring andEvaluation Specialist.| Due Date :30-Dec-2014
Finance Agreement :Recruitment of an Internal Auditor | Description :The recipient has recruited an internal Auditor. | Due Date:30-Sep-2014

Finance Agreement :Recuitment of external auditor | Description :The Recipient shall recruit not later than six (6) months afterthe Effective Date, the external auditor referred to in Section 4.09 (b) of the General Conditions in accordance with Section IIIof Schedule 2 of this Agreement and pursuant to terms of reference satisfactory to the Association;. | Due Date :30-Mar-2015
